mapper.select: SELECT main_name, main_perks1, main_perks2, main_perks3, main_perks4, sub_name, sub_perks1, sub_perks2, stat_perks1, stat_perks2, stat_perks3, COUNT(*) AS Count, round(COUNT(*)/(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM zzz_datas_rune WHERE championName_KR = #{championName_KR})*100, 2) as percentage, round((COUNT(CASE WHEN win = 1 THEN 1 END) / COUNT(*) * 100),2) AS win_percentage FROM zzz_datas_rune WHERE championName_KR = #{championName_KR} and teamPosition = #{teamPosition} and tier1 = #{tier1} GROUP BY main_name, sub_name ORDER BY Count DESC LIMIT 1;

SELECT item6, shoes, core1, core2, core3, COUNT(*) AS Count, round(COUNT(*)/(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM zzz_item2 WHERE championName_KR = #{championName_KR} and teamPosition = #{teamPosition} )*100, 2) as percentage, round((COUNT(CASE WHEN win = 1 THEN 1 END) / COUNT(*) * 100),2) AS win_percentage FROM zzz_item1 WHERE championName_KR = #{championName_KR} and teamPosition = #{teamPosition} and tier1 = #{tier1} and core2 != 0 and core3 != 0 GROUP BY core1 ORDER BY Count DESC LIMIT 1;

SELECT value1, value2, value3, value4, value5, value6, value7, value8, value9, value10, value11, value12, COUNT(*) AS skill_count, round(COUNT(*)/(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM zzz_datas_personal2 WHERE championName = #{championName} and teamPosition = #{teamPosition})*100, 2) as percentage FROM ( SELECT JSON_EXTRACT(skill_tree, '$[0]') AS value1, JSON_EXTRACT(skill_tree, '$[1]') AS value2, JSON_EXTRACT(skill_tree, '$[2]') AS value3, JSON_EXTRACT(skill_tree, '$[3]') AS value4, JSON_EXTRACT(skill_tree, '$[4]') AS value5, JSON_EXTRACT(skill_tree, '$[5]') AS value6, JSON_EXTRACT(skill_tree, '$[6]') AS value7, JSON_EXTRACT(skill_tree, '$[7]') AS value8, JSON_EXTRACT(skill_tree, '$[8]') AS value9, JSON_EXTRACT(skill_tree, '$[9]') AS value10, JSON_EXTRACT(skill_tree, '$[10]') AS value11, JSON_EXTRACT(skill_tree, '$[11]') AS value12 FROM zzz_datas_personal2 WHERE teamPosition = #{teamPosition} and championName_KR = #{championName_KR} ) AS subquery GROUP BY value1, value2, value3, value4, value5, value6, value7, value8, value9, value10, value11, value12 ORDER BY skill_count DESC LIMIT 1;

SELECT summoner1Id, summoner2Id, COUNT(*) AS spell_Count, round(COUNT(*)/(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM zzz_datas_personal2 WHERE championName_KR = #{championName_KR} and teamPosition = #{teamPosition})*100, 2) as percentage FROM zzz_datas_personal2 WHERE championName_KR = #{championName_KR} and teamPosition = #{teamPosition} GROUP BY summoner1Id, summoner2Id ORDER BY spell_Count DESC limit 1;
